05 Feb 2017

Welcome

The domain - http://theh2h.org is owned by the team and on a whole it is build on jekyll (static website designer). Hosting any website is a tedious job, and requires some investment - but we have github pages to the rescue . -hosting made free.

Everything has a purpose… so does the website. We are striving hard and we don’t want the community to stay behind. For purpose of keeping the community updated, anything and everything the team is working on will be put up on the posts link .

moving forward ; This website will also act as a link for connecting people from our social handles to the telegram group, so that the volunteers abide by the terms and conditions before joining the group. If you aren’t a member yet, Join Now

That’s it for now.

-Thank you for stopping by.

Anything to ask mail us
